casename: Govindasamy Supramaniam v Bailey Foreign Holdings Corp and Others
counsel: Lee Eng Beng and Mark Cheng Wai Yuen (Rajah and Tann) for the plaintiff; Dhillon Dinesh Singh and Rachel Chong Sue-Fen (Wong and Leow LLC) for the first to fourth defendants; The fifth defendant not represented
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Interim orders/Plaintiff removed as managing director by properly constituted act of company's board of directors/Allegations of serious wrongdoing by both sides/Whether to grant interim mandatory injunction reinstating plaintiff as managing director
